titleStmt.title: To the inhabitants and souldery of the city of London grace, mercy and peace from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

notesStmt.note: A letter giving warning of a "great and dreadful judgement suddenly to approach, a judgement by fire and sword." -- Cf. Thomason catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "scatered about ye street 19 March 165 [illegible]".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
